properties.markdownProperty:
System GUI components follow a hierarchical structure. The main component **MainWindow** is created when the application boots, all the other components are created from the main component.
A component can be a part of the main application window (menu, tab, etc), a dialog or just a background component that does not interact with the user but perform background operations. Components inherit from **ProteusComponent** class, if needed they will inherit from the specific **QWidget** class. **ProteusComponent** class inherit from **QObject**. The class constructor provide the object instance access to multiple application layer objects that are neccesary to interact with the other components and the backend.
